item.title: EC-Council | ECSA
item.description: How is ECSA different from CEH? CEH exposes the learner to various hacking tools and techniques, while ECSA exposes the learner to the analysis and interpretation of results obtained from using those tools and techniques. via eccouncil.org Wait a minute. So the CEH course gives you access to the tools but you need an ECSA to understand what the results of those tools are? HEAD EXPLODES
